meanings.definition: Arrange (data) in a specific format for storage or transmission.
meanings.sent1: I need to serialize the information before sending it over the internet.
meanings.sent2: It is important to serialize the data before saving it to the database.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally tried to serialize a banana instead of the actual data.
meanings.sent4: She has a unique way to serialize her thoughts into organized paragraphs.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to serialize our answers for better understanding.

meanings.definition: Convert (an object or data structure) into a format that can be stored or transmitted.
meanings.sent1: Before sending the file, I need to serialize it for compatibility.
meanings.sent2: The program will automatically serialize the data for easier storage.
meanings.sent3: I tried to serialize my cat into a digital file, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to serialize complex ideas into simple explanations is impressive.
meanings.sent5: He managed to serialize the entire story into a single tweet.
